translation.en: [speaking English] She says it is the work... of the barbarian devil king.
translation.fr: Elle dit que c'est l'œuvredu roi démon barbare.

translation.en: [man speaking English] Her village was loyal to the rebel Song dynasty.
translation.fr: Son village soutenait les rebellesde la dynastie Song.

translation.en: If one does not submit to the rule of the Khan...
translation.fr: Ceux qui refusent de se soumettre au khan

translation.en: this is what happens.
[Kublai speaking English] The Latins.
Yes, I remember.
But where are the Christian priests you were to bring, hmm?
translation.fr: Mais où sont les prêtres chrétiensque vous deviez amener ?

translation.en: [Niccolò] Lord Kublai... please accept our remorse.
Our priests could not bear the rigors of the journey.
translation.fr: Nos prêtres n'auraient pas supportéles difficultés de ce périple.

translation.en: But we did bring you holy oil from--
translation.fr: Mais nous vous avons apportéde l'huile sainte de--

translation.en: Your men of God retreat, but this boy advances.
translation.fr: Vos hommes de Dieu renoncent,mais ce garçon a effectué le voyage.

translation.en: It says very little for your savior. Hmm?
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas flatteur pour votre Sauveur.

translation.en: Loyalty... of a mortal son to a mortal father, Great Khan.
translation.fr: C'est la loyauté d'un fils mortelenvers son père mortel, Grand Khan.

translation.en: Holy oil
from the pontiff who wishes to spread
translation.fr: du souverain pontife qui souhaite étendre

translation.en: Christianity throughout my lands.
translation.fr: la chrétienté à travers mes terres.

translation.en: Is this not the same Pope who has called me "the spawn of Satan"?
translation.fr: N'est-ce pas le même papequi m'a traité de "suppôt de Satan" ?

translation.en: I will say this and you will listen.
translation.fr: Ecoutez ce que j'ai à vous dire.

translation.en: Christianity is welcome in my kingdom.
translation.fr: Le christianisme est le bienvenudans mon royaume.

translation.en: As is Buddhism...
Judaism... Islam...
and the Eternal Blue Sky of my grandfather, Genghis Khan,
translation.fr: et le Ciel Bleu Eternelde mon grand-père, Genghis Khan,

translation.en: descended from a wolf.
So, tell your Pope that he himself must bow before me...
translation.fr: Alors dites à votre papequ'il doit s'agenouiller devant moi

translation.en: and pledge his fealty to me.
As for you merchants...
you crossed ocean and mountain...
translation.fr: vous avez traverséles océans et les montagnes,

translation.en: the great Takla Makan Desert.
One not many men survive.
translation.fr: Rares sont ceux qui y survivent.

translation.en: Describe for me my desert, hmm?
It is a...
most barren region, Sire.
No water. No life, Lord Khan.
translation.fr: Ni eau ni vie, seigneur Khan.

translation.en: -Not even a bird. -Not even a bird.
translation.fr: - Ni même d'oiseaux.- Ni même d'oiseaux.

translation.en: It is, Great Khan... a sea of death.
translation.fr: Grand Khan, c'est un océan de mort.

translation.en: Yet very much alive.
At night you hear it.
The shifting sands, they... sing.
translation.fr: Le sable qui se déplace, il... chante.

translation.en: Humble apologies, Sire. -He does not yet know the rules of the-- -[Kublai grunts]
translation.fr: Veuillez le pardonner, sire.Il ignore les règles de--

translation.en: Voices like... spirits...
trying to lure you off course.
This is why men die out there.
translation.fr: Voilà pourquoi des hommes meurentdans le désert.

translation.en: The Uighurs called it...
You learned the tongue of the Uighurs?
translation.fr: Tu as appris la langue des Ouïghours ?

translation.en: Three years was not long enough to learn it all.
translation.fr: Trois années ne m'ont pas suffià la maîtriser parfaitement.

translation.en: [speaking English] Of all the lands a traveler passes through...
translation.fr: Parmi toutes les contréesqu'un voyageur peut visiter,

translation.en: which province contains...
in your eye, the most beautiful women of all?
translation.fr: selon toi, les plus belles femmes ?

translation.en: I find that all women, no matter from which land...
translation.fr: Je trouve que toutes les femmes,peu importent leurs origines,

translation.en: they are all beautiful in their own unique manner.
In Italy, we have a saying...
translation.fr: En Italie,il existe un proverbe à ce sujet :

translation.en: [speaking English] "The true sweetness of wine...
is one flavor."
You have a clever mind.
For a Latin.
I made one request. It was not for oil.
translation.fr: Je n'avais demandé qu'une chose.Ce n'était pas de l'huile.

translation.en: It was for priests. With this, you failed.
translation.fr: C'était des prêtres. Vous avez échoué.

translation.en: Take your leave.
Go, Latins.
You're banished forever.
You are most correct, Lord Khan.
The boy...
has a clever mind and... excellent perception.
translation.fr: possède une grande intelligenceet une excellente perception.

translation.en: He is my son...
and most dear to me.
But if it pleases Your Greatness, you may take him as your man and servant.
translation.fr: Mais si Votre Grandeur le souhaite,vous pouvez vous attacher ses services.

translation.en: What do you wish in return?
The opportunity to pay tribute to my Khan from my journeys...
translation.fr: L'opportunité de rendre hommageà mon khan pour mon périple

translation.en: along the Silk Road.
translation.fr: le long de la route de la soie.

translation.en: Father, what are you doing?
Marco, trust this. Be silent.
-I am your son. -[whispering] Be silent.
You wish not the honor of service in the court of the Khan of Khans?
translation.fr: Tu refuses l'honneur de servirla cour du khan d'entre les khans ?

translation.en: What greater tribute can a man offer than his own flesh and his own blood?
translation.fr: Un homme ne peut pas offrir mieuxque sa chair et son sang.

translation.en: You Latin merchants may engage in trade along my Silk Road.
translation.fr: Les marchands latins peuvent faire affairesur ma route de la soie.

translation.en: Ahmad, my Minister of Finance,
will discuss taxation and transit.
translation.fr: vous indiquera les taxes et le transit.

translation.en: Take your leave.
-Marco, you have to trust me. -Father!
-This will not be forever. -Don't do this.
translation.fr: - Ce n'est que temporaire.- Ne faites pas ça.

translation.en: We will secure the trade routes and be back for you.
translation.fr: Nous assurerons les routes du commerce,puis nous reviendrons te chercher.

translation.en: And I still want those priests.
Father! Don't leave me here.
[speaking English] Of all the things I expected to come home to after all these years...
translation.fr: Je ne m'attendais pas à ça à mon retouraprès des années de voyage...

translation.en: "Marco." She gave you a fine name.
translation.fr: "Marco". Elle t'a donné un joli nom.

translation.en: When did she pass?
I was six.
From Jerusalem.
It has guarded my heart for 14 years.
translation.fr: Cette croix a protégé mon cœurpendant 14 ans.

translation.en: Psalms 72:11.
"All kings shall fall before him."
-Where were you? -The Silk Road.
translation.fr: - Où étiez-vous ?- Sur la route de la soie.

translation.en: It ends here in Venezia.
It stretches 4,000 miles across the world.
translation.fr: Elle s'étend sur 6 500 kmà travers le monde.

translation.en: Why did you never send word to Mother?
It is not simple.
We had an arrangement.
But had I any idea of the birth of a son...
translation.fr: Mais si j'avais su que j'avais un fils...

translation.en: You have her eyes.
Well, now...
your Uncle Maffeo and I...
we have important business to discuss with the Bishop
translation.fr: devons parler de choses importantesavec l'évêque

translation.en: before we set sail again.
[Marco] I will travel with you.
Father. Do not leave me alone again.
translation.fr: Père, ne m'abandonnez pas à nouveau.

translation.en: This is not possible.
You are not prepared for the rigors of the journey ahead.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas prêtpour les rigueurs de ce périple.

translation.en: -[wind howling] -[priest] Lord, help us!
Lord, help us!
Get over there!
I can help!
You defied me, boy!
You do not belong here! Stay away from me!
translation.fr: Ta place n'est pas ici !Ne t'approche pas de moi !

translation.en: [man speaking English] No, no, no.
[speaking English] Very good.
[priest] This is not what we imagined. We must return to our flock.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ce que nous imaginions.Nous devons retrouver nos ouailles.

translation.en: You are not abandoning our factor.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pasabandonner notre courtier.

translation.en: Your Bishop gave you orders.
translation.fr: Votre évêque vous a donné des ordres.

translation.en: Then follow us back to Venice...
and bring the Bishop instead.
Uncle, Uncle, these are men of God.
translation.fr: Mon oncle, ce sont des hommes de Dieu.

translation.en: -Godspeed. -Thank you. Thank you.
Enough!
You have no knowledge of our world! Do not act as if you do!
translation.fr: Tu ne connais pas notre monde !Arrête de croire le contraire !

translation.en: Take your donkey.
Follow the priests back to the ship.
Go home.
[Niccolò] Marco!
[Maffeo] We have lost three days.
[Niccolò] We haven't lost a thing, Maffeo.
The Khan and our trade routes slip away
translation.fr: Le khanet nos routes commerciales s'éloignent

translation.en: while you make amends for your fatherly sins.
translation.fr: pendant que tu expies tes péchés de père.

translation.en: He is our blood.
Mark my words.
He will gut the foundation of everything we have labored to build.
translation.fr: Il anéantira le fruit de nos efforts.

translation.en: -Get out. -What?
Get out.
Run!
-[Maffeo] Take cover! -Everyone, run!
Run! Go!
Go! Run!
[Maffeo] Take cover!
[Niccolò] Move! Move! Move!
Were you frightened earlier?
translation.fr: Tu as eu peur, tout à l'heure ?

translation.en: I was not.
I was terrified the first time I left home.
translation.fr: J'étais terrifié la première foisque je suis parti de chez moi.

translation.en: Venezia was all I had ever known.
Do you know how I persevered?
Knowing just where home was...
translation.fr: Je savais où se trouvait ma maison.

translation.en: and that I could always return to it.
Do you see those stars there?
The Three Sisters.
The Three Sisters.
If you are ever afraid...
if ever you doubt your place in the world...
translation.fr: si tu doutes de ta place dans le monde,

translation.en: follow The Three Sisters and they will lead you home.
translation.fr: suis les Trois Sœurs,elles te mèneront chez toi.

translation.en: My only fear...
is that I might awaken in my bed...
translation.fr: c'est de me réveiller dans mon lit,

translation.en: destined to live a common life once again.
The blood of an adventurer courses through your veins.
translation.fr: Le sang d'un aventurier couledans tes veines.

translation.en: I can see this.
You will enjoy the greatest adventure of all.
translation.fr: Tu vivras la plus grande des aventures.

translation.en: You will meet...
the richest...
most powerful king on the face of this earth.
translation.fr: et le plus puissant des rois de ce monde.

translation.en: The Great Kublai Khan.
[Kublai] The Song rebels of Xiangyang...
can no longer cast aside our dominion with impunity.
translation.fr: ne rejettent plus notre autoritéen toute impunité.

translation.en: As my trusted advisors, I seek your counsel.
translation.fr: Vous êtes des conseillers dignesde confiance, je veux votre opinion.

translation.en: You will one day sit here where I do now.
translation.fr: Un jour, tu prendras ma place.

translation.en: Speak to your uncles and cousins who have traveled far.
translation.fr: Parle à tes oncles et à tes cousinsqui sont venus de loin.

translation.en: Destroying the Song dynasty rebels is wise.
translation.fr: Il est sage de détruire les rebellesde la dynastie Song.

translation.en: But is it not wiser to let them remain in their Walled City...
translation.fr: N'est-il pas plus sage de les laisserdans leur Cité Fortifiée

translation.en: paying us tribute?
translation.fr: afin qu'ils nous versent un tribut ?

translation.en: What does my vice regent, Yusuf, say on this matter?
translation.fr: Que me conseillele vice-régent Yusuf à ce sujet ?

translation.en: Prince Jingim is correct.
North China already adores Lord Kublai.
translation.fr: La Chine du Nord adore déjàle seigneur Kubilai.

translation.en: Let South China remain within their Walled City.
translation.fr: Que la Chine du Sud restedans sa Cité Fortifiée.

translation.en: Treat the rebels as a...
cow that we draw milk from...
translation.fr: comme une vache dont nous tirons le lait,

translation.en: rather than slaughtering the cow, and receiving no milk.
translation.fr: plutôt que comme une vacheque nous tuons sans en tirer de lait.

translation.en: [Ahmad] Or silk...
in this case.
The Walled City of Xiangyang... guards the Yangtze River.
translation.fr: La Cité Fortifiée de Xiangyangprotège le fleuve Yang-Tsé.

translation.en: And the Yangtze is the gateway to all China.
translation.fr: Et le Yang-Tsé est la porte vers la Chine.

translation.en: You are the Great Khan of Khans.
translation.fr: Vous êtes le Grand Khan d'entre les khans.

translation.en: You desire a unified China. It should be yours no matter the cost.
translation.fr: Vous désirez une Chine unifiée.Rien ne doit l'empêcher.

translation.en: The Minister of Finance speaks well.
translation.fr: Le ministre des Finances a bien parlé.

translation.en: But this is a matter of security and defense,
translation.fr: Mais il s'agit de sécurité et de défense,

translation.en: not coin and commerce.
Little brother...
Ariq the Strong.
How are things in Karakorum?
translation.fr: Quelle est la situation à Karakorum ?

translation.en: Things in the Old Capital
are just as our grandfather, Genghis, would have them.
translation.fr: est telle que notre grand-père Genghisl'aurait souhaitée.

translation.en: [Ariq] But there are some in Karakorum who fear
that our Khan is becoming too Chinese... too cultured in his ways.
translation.fr: que notre khan ne devienne trop chinois,trop cultivé.

translation.en: [Kaidu] Lord Khan...
may your western cousins from the House of Ögödei speak?
translation.fr: accorde la paroleà tes cousins du clan d'Ogödei.

translation.en: Does the Great Khan desire to be Emperor of Mongolia...
translation.fr: Le Grand Khan désire-t-il devenirempereur de Mongolie

translation.en: or Emperor of China?
you forget the mandate Grandfather was handed from heaven.
translation.fr: tu oublies la mission célesteconfiée à notre grand-père.

translation.en: To erase dividing lines from country to country.
translation.fr: Supprimer les frontières entre les pays.

translation.en: A mandate to spread our customs...
translation.fr: La missionconsistant à répandre nos coutumes,

translation.en: our cultures... our very way of life...
to every corner beneath the Blue Sky.
Only one thing stood in his way, as it now stands in mine.
translation.fr: Un seul obstacle lui barrait la route,le même qui se dresse devant moi.

translation.en: Xiangyang... the Walled City.
I have already sent troops into South China.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà envoyé des troupesen Chine du Sud.

translation.en: They are amassing at this very moment.
translation.fr: Elles se rassemblent en ce moment même.

translation.en: My spies tell me that in order to starve the rebels out...
translation.fr: Mes espions me rapportentque pour affamer les rebelles,

translation.en: we must cut them off from the farming village of Wuchang.
translation.fr: nous devons les priverdu village agricole de Wuchang.

translation.en: I am sending horse soldiers to that position.
translation.fr: J'envoie des cavaliers à cette position.

translation.en: Jingim...
blood of my blood, will lead the assault on Wuchang.
translation.fr: le sang de mon sang,dirigera l'assaut contre Wuchang.

translation.en: [Kaidu] Jingim...
educated in Chinese ways.
translation.fr: qui connaît si bien la culture chinoise.

translation.en: Who better to lead an attack on the Chinese?
translation.fr: Personne n'est plus qualifiépour attaquer les Chinois.

translation.en: [Ariq] Older brother...
if this is a call to war... you will have my horse and bow.
translation.fr: s'il s'agit d'une déclaration de guerre,compte sur mon cheval et mon arc.

translation.en: I will lead our Golden Horde down from the north...
translation.fr: Je dirigerai la Horde d'or depuis le nord.

translation.en: and into battle with my nephew.
translation.fr: Je rejoindrai mon neveu dans la bataille.

translation.en: We will crush Wuchang, then take the Walled City.
translation.fr: Nous écraserons Wuchang,puis nous prendrons la Cité Fortifiée.

translation.en: And by the blood of Genghis...
translation.fr: Et par le sang de Genghis,

translation.en: I will cut their leader's head off and tie it to the mane of my horse!
translation.fr: je trancherai la tête de leur chefet l'attacherai à mon cheval !

translation.en: Emperor of China?
Emperor of Mongolia?
I will be Emperor of the World!
[Jia Sidao] Empress Dowager.
Rise.
How may the Chancellor ease your pain?
translation.fr: Comment le chancelier peut-il soulagervos souffrances ?

translation.en: Tell me the barbarians are no longer marching toward us.
[Jia Sidao] I will not lie. The Khan's troops advance.
translation.fr: Inutile de vous mentir.Les troupes du Khan avancent.

translation.en: But upon the soul of our Emperor...
translation.fr: Mais sur l'âme de notre empereur,

translation.en: I promise, they will never succeed.
translation.fr: je vous prometsque jamais elles ne réussiront.

translation.en: Long live Song empire.
My mantis is great. Do you see?
translation.fr: Ma mante religieuse est formidable.Vous voyez ?

translation.en: He feigns inferiority to encourage his opponent's advance.
translation.fr: Elle feint l'inférioritépour inciter ses ennemis à avancer.

translation.en: [Jia Sidao] I paid a visit to the Emperor's bedside.
translation.fr: Je suis allé au chevet de l'empereur.

translation.en: [Red Brow] How is he?
Quite unwell.
[Red Brow] His legacy will live on within these walls.
translation.fr: Son héritage vivra dans ces murs.

translation.en: It will be a sad day... but much more efficient once he's gone.
translation.fr: Ce sera une triste journée,mais sa mort nous sera utile.

translation.en: No more mixed messages from an old king to his people.
translation.fr: Finis les messages ambigusd'un vieux roi à son peuple.

translation.en: I will give all orders and all orders will be followed.
translation.fr: Je donnerai tous les ordres,et ils seront suivis à la lettre.

translation.en: Yes, my Chancellor.
And that goes for the Emperor's favorite royal concubine.
translation.fr: C'est également valablepour la concubine préférée de l'empereur.

translation.en: Where is your sister?
Doing that for which she is famous.
translation.fr: Elle fait ce pour quoi elle est célèbre.

translation.en: Improving diplomatic ties with the Governor of Suzhou.
translation.fr: Elle améliore les relations diplomatiquesavec le gouverneur de Suzhou.

translation.en: Do you know this game?
[Mei Lin] How much did you pay my brother for this opportunity?
translation.fr: Combien avez-vous payé mon frèrepour cette opportunité ?

translation.en: More porcelain than he's ever seen.
translation.fr: Plus de porcelaine qu'il n'en a jamais vu.

translation.en: Do not fear, Governor.
This is part of the game you paid for.
translation.fr: Cela fait partie du jeupour lequel vous avez payé.

translation.en: -The Danger Game. -[whimpers]
You...
are but a lowly... worm.
[guard] Come.
[Hundred Eyes] You have questions.
[Marco] Just one.
Am I a privileged guest or a prisoner in this hell?
translation.fr: Suis-je un invité de marqueou un prisonnier de cet enfer ?

translation.en: A fiery one.
No wonder the Khan caged you for his own personal amusement.
translation.fr: Pas étonnant que le khant'ait fait enfermer pour son plaisir.

translation.en: You're blind.
Not as blind as you, boy.
No roots.
You have spirit, Latin.
Of the Yin and the Yang, you have an abundance of Yang.
translation.fr: Tu ne manques pas de Yang.

translation.en: But without Yin, Yang dies on the battlefield.
translation.fr: Mais sans Yin, le Yang meurt au combat.

translation.en: We are all prisoners here.
Prisoners and privileged guests. One and the same.
translation.fr: Prisonniers et invités de marque.C'est la même chose.

translation.en: If you are unable to protect yourself in the kingdom...
translation.fr: Si tu es incapablede te protéger dans ce royaume,

translation.en: it is I... who will be killed.
Do you understand?
Good. We begin with roots.
[Hundred Eyes] You have been conscripted into the court of Kublai Khan.
translation.fr: Tu as été astreintà la cour de Kubilai Khan.

translation.en: For what? I do not know.
-I am Hundred Eyes. -[grunting]
I am kept here to train the Khan's sons... his nobles...
translation.fr: Mon rôle consisteà former les fils du khan, ses nobles,

translation.en: his pets.
You shall be tutored in the Mongolian ways of the horse.
translation.fr: Tu apprendras à monter à chevalcomme un Mongol.

translation.en: You shall be tutored in the great arts of the East...
translation.fr: Tu recevrasune formation en arts orientaux,

translation.en: by those scholars and artisans loyal to Lord Kublai.
translation.fr: dispensée par les érudits et les artisansfidèles au seigneur Kubilai,

translation.en: Languages and letters.
Hawking and archery.
And in the end... you may discover the answer to your question.
translation.fr: Après tout cela, tu trouveras peut-êtrela réponse à ta question.

translation.en: [Kublai] A man found in possession of a stolen horse...
translation.fr: Un homme trouvé en possessiond'un cheval volé

translation.en: must return it to its owner, add nine horses of the same kind.
translation.fr: doit le rendre à son propriétaire,ainsi que neuf chevaux de la même race.

translation.en: If he is unable to pay this fine...
translation.fr: S'il n'est pas en mesurede payer l'amende,

translation.en: his children must be taken instead of the horses.
If he has no children...
then he must be slaughtered like a sheep.
translation.fr: il sera massacré comme un mouton.

translation.en: That man has no children.
I hear from my Minister of Falconry, you have taken well to the hawks.
translation.fr: D'après mon maître fauconnier,tu aimes les faucons.

translation.en: Archery is improving, yes?
translation.fr: Tu fais des progrès en archerie ?

translation.en: Yes, Great Khan.
I, myself, was always a bit clumsy with the making of Chinese characters.
translation.fr: J'ai toujours eu du malà tracer les caractères chinois.

translation.en: When you and your father crossed Central Asia...
translation.fr: Quand vous avez traversé l'Asie centrale,ton père et toi

translation.en: you passed through Badakhshān.
Describe for me, in the way that you do...
how you made the passage, what you saw.
translation.fr: explique-moi ce que vous avez vulors de votre passage.

translation.en: We saw sand.
Rode beasts.
Do you defy me?
Describe for me the land of Badakhshān.
The footing was hard on our beasts.
translation.fr: Le terrain était difficilepour nos montures.

translation.en: The sun very hot.
Take him to the horse grounds. Stuff his mouth with the shit of pigs.
translation.fr: Emmenez-le aux écuries.Remplissez sa bouche de fientes de porc.

translation.en: You enter a gate made of rock...
translation.fr: On franchit une porte en pierre,

translation.en: east of Bukhara...
and begin to ascend into the Pamir Mountains.
There are great numbers of all kind of wild beasts.
translation.fr: Il y a différentes créatures sauvages,en grand nombre.

translation.en: And the men of Badakhshān...
speak of a breed of horse which is said to be the direct offspring of Alexander's.
translation.fr: parlent d'une race de chevalqui semble descendre de celui d'Alexandre.

translation.en: Odd bit of trivia.
I've always been taken by the audacity of Alexander.
A great conqueror.
There are 20 cities that bear his name, huh?
translation.fr: Il y a 20 villes qui portent son nom.

translation.en: I now possess them all.
Do you blame me for your current station in life?
translation.fr: Me crois-tu responsablede ta situation actuelle ?

translation.en: No, Sire.
I simply wonder why you kept me.
translation.fr: Mais j'ignore pourquoi vous m'avez gardé.

translation.en: I need no reason, Latin.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas besoin de raison, Latin.

translation.en: As my servant...
you will accompany a tax collector as he makes his rounds.
translation.fr: tu accompagneras un percepteur d'impôtslors de sa tournée.

translation.en: This will give you a view of my Imperial City and my subjects.
translation.fr: Cela te permettra de comprendrema cité impériale et mes sujets.

translation.en: You will report back to me, describe what you have seen...
translation.fr: Tu me décriras tout ce que tu as vu,

translation.en: as you saw it.
I'm giving you freedom.
But the walls of my kingdom stretch beyond the horizon.
translation.fr: Mais les murs de mon royaume s'étendentau-delà de l'horizon.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Yes, Sire.
I give you leave.
I assumed you would be riding to Wuchang by now.
translation.fr: Je croyaisque tu étais déjà en route pour Wuchang.

translation.en: The astrologers told you this morning was the most auspicious hour to march.
translation.fr: Les astrologues t'avaient dit que c'étaitle meilleur moment pour marcher.

translation.en: The Confucian advisors said it is better we ride at night.
translation.fr: Les conseillers confucéens ont ditqu'il vaut mieux chevaucher de nuit.

translation.en: They also believe a war can be won without fighting.
translation.fr: Ils pensent aussiqu'on peut faire la guerre sans se battre.

translation.en: Why must they always speak in riddles?
-"The supreme art of war," Father. -Mmm.
translation.fr: C'est "l'art suprême de la guerre", père.

translation.en: Still...
tomorrow I ride to Wuchang as a Mongol...
translation.fr: je pars demain pour Wuchangen tant que Mongol

translation.en: and I carry my father's flag.
translation.fr: et je porte l'étendard de mon père.

translation.en: You are your mother's son, Jingim.
translation.fr: Tu es le fils de ta mère, Jingim.

translation.en: Educated... patient... noble.
There will be a time for all these things in the new dynasty.
translation.fr: Il y aura un temps pour toutes ces chosesdans la nouvelle dynastie.

translation.en: I must prepare to ride.
translation.fr: Je dois me préparer à chevaucher.

translation.en: My three wives each desire a visit before I go to battle.
translation.fr: Mes trois femmes souhaitent ma visiteavant que je me rende au combat.

translation.en: You're also your father's son.
translation.fr: Tu es aussi le fils de ton père.

translation.en: Give to me the nectar... so I keep it when you go...
translation.fr: Donnez-moi votre nectar,je le garderai en votre absence

translation.en: and give you a son.
translation.fr: et je vous donnerai un fils.

translation.en: -And what if it's a daughter? -[chuckles]
Yang the Healer says to do it like this, in the Golden Lotus,
translation.fr: Yang le guérisseur dit de faire comme ça,dans la position du lotus d'or,

translation.en: and I shall finally bear you an heir.
translation.fr: et je vous donnerai enfin un héritier.

translation.en: Yang the Healer will be promoted to the ministry.
translation.fr: Yang le guérisseur sera promu ministre.

translation.en: Tell me...
does your Chinese wife do it like this? Huh?
translation.fr: votre femme chinoise fait comme ça ?

translation.en: [woman] Nice. They're so beautiful. You can let it go.
translation.fr: Parfait. Elles sont superbes.Tu peux la lâcher.

translation.en: Are you ready?
Here we go.
the Venetian.
A pleasure to formally make your acquaintance.
translation.fr: C'est un plaisir de vous rencontrer.

translation.en: She is my charge, so avert your gaze.
translation.fr: Elle est sous ma protection,détournez le regard.

translation.en: She is far past the reach of a foreign merchant's son.
translation.fr: Le fils d'un marchand étrangern'est pas digne d'elle.

translation.en: I followed the wrong path.
-Indeed you did... -[bell tolls]
and the clock tower just struck first bell.
translation.fr: et vous feriez mieux de disparaître.

translation.en: My apologies to you.
The Governor said the songs they sing about you south of Quinsai are true.
translation.fr: Le gouverneur a dit que les chansonssur le sud de Hangzhou sont vraies.

translation.en: You pleased him greatly.
translation.fr: Il a été très satisfait de toi.

translation.en: [Mei Lin] The Emperor's dying.
You must honor his wishes.
Anything he wants.
Make a truce with the barbarians.
translation.fr: Instaure une trêve avec les barbares.

translation.en: That was not what the Emperor desired when he was well and strong.
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas ce que l'empereur désiraitquand il était fort et bien portant.

translation.en: Truce is the dying cry of the weak and the sick.
translation.fr: La trêve est l'ultime souhaitdes faibles et des malades.

translation.en: [Mei Lin] Kublai is too strong.
I worry for my daughter if the barbarians take our city.
translation.fr: Je m'inquiète pour ma fille,si les barbares prennent notre cité.

translation.en: Let your Chancellor manage military affairs.
translation.fr: Laisse ton chanceliers'occuper des affaires militaires.

translation.en: You manage the imperial bed chamber.
Let the Chancellor not forget who it was who won him favor in this court.
translation.fr: Que le chancelier n'oublie pasqui lui a obtenu les faveurs de la cour.

translation.en: When the strike of the praying mantis breaks the body of the cricket,
translation.fr: Quand le coup de la mante religieusebrise le corps du grillon,

translation.en: it is because of its timing.
translation.fr: c'est parce qu'il sait choisir son moment.

translation.en: Timing, Mei Lin.
Trust me, like my soldiers do.
And worry no more.
When the Emperor is gone, you will still be esteemed in this court.
translation.fr: Quand l'empereur aura disparu,tu seras toujours estimée de cette cour.

translation.en: [Hundred Eyes] Get up.
Get up.
I did not ask to train you, Latin.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas demandé à te former, Latin.

translation.en: There is no honor in this for me.
Nor did you ask to be left here by a man
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas non plus demandéà être abandonné par un homme

translation.en: who would trade his own son like 2 pounds of spice...
translation.fr: qui échangerait son fils commes'il s'agissait de vulgaires épices...

translation.en: for the opportunity to open trade routes to the West.
translation.fr: en échange de l'opportunité d'ouvrirdes routes commerciales vers l'Occident.

translation.en: Go ahead, take it.
Let him go, Latin.
Let him go.
Get up.
If you wish to survive here, get up at once.
The foreigner has been summoned.
translation.fr: La présence de l'étranger est exigée.

translation.en: It is quiet.
As it is before a typhoon.
By the Eternal Blue Sky, let us sing from our throats
translation.fr: Par le Ciel Bleu Eternel, chantons,

translation.en: and let them hear the devil that they are about to meet.
translation.fr: qu'ils entendent les démonsqu'ils vont rencontrer.

translation.en: The sons of my father's concubines always speak the loudest.
translation.fr: Les fils des concubines de mon pèresont toujours les plus bruyants.

translation.en: We must attack as Genghis would.
translation.fr: Nous devons attaquerà la manière de Genghis.

translation.en: Ariq... he is not there.
What do you mean "he is not there"?
[panting] No Ariq.
No Golden Horde.
Just grass and sky.
[Nima] Ah, yes.
Welcome.
Proceed down the hall.
And Master Marco... I will be watching you.
[Kublai] Enter.
Your new quarters are more spacious than the last, no?
translation.fr: Tes nouveaux quartiers sont plus spacieuxque les précédents, non ?

translation.en: Yes, very much. Thank you.
[Kublai] I have a test for you.
You will walk back down the Hall of Five Desires.
translation.fr: Tu retournerasdans la Salle des Cinq Désirs.

translation.en: These girls are from Kungurat...
highly skilled in the arts of love.
translation.fr: Elles sont douéespour tout ce qui touche à l'amour.

translation.en: A man who proves his loyalty to me can take whatever he wishes.
translation.fr: Un homme qui me prouve sa fidélitépeut prendre tout ce qu'il désire.

translation.en: -You may not. -[women moaning]
Not yet.
Look... but do not touch.
[Chabi] The walls have eyes, Marco Polo.
translation.fr: Les murs ont des yeux, Marco Polo.

translation.en: Do you hear them taunt us?
translation.fr: Vous les entendez ?Ils se moquent de nous.

translation.en: They mock our blood.
translation.fr: Ils se moquent de notre lignage.

translation.en: Even without Ariq's army, we should still attack like Mongols...
translation.fr: Même sans l'armée d'Ariq,nous devrions attaquer comme des Mongols

translation.en: or retreat as cowards.
translation.fr: ou battre en retraite comme des lâches.

translation.en: [Jingim] That is no farming village.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un village agricole.

translation.en: How many men did you say we have?
Five hundred?
And down there?
[Byamba] More. Many more.
[Aruka] As your General...
I advise... retreat.
We do not return home until we conquer that village.
translation.fr: Nous ne rentrerons pas chez nousavant d'avoir conquis ce village.

translation.en: Give the command.
